traits.name: Extinguish Flames
traits.desc: Kalkes can extinguish candles, lamps, lanterns and low-burning campfires within 120 feet as a bonus action.

traits.name: Detect Spellcasting
traits.desc: Kalkes can sense spellcasting in a 5-mile radius, as long as the effect is not innate.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: Kalkes have advantage on saving throws against spells and magical effects.

actions.name: Dagger
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4 + 3) piercing damage.
